query:
UPDATE backer_payouts SET (id, 
backer_id, 
asami_amount, 
disbursement_id, 
paid, 
created_at) = ((CASE $2::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $3 ELSE id END), (CASE $4::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $5 ELSE backer_id END), (CASE $6::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $7 ELSE asami_amount END), (CASE $8::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $9 ELSE disbursement_id END), (CASE $10::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $11 ELSE paid END), (CASE $12::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $13 ELSE created_at END)) WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id as "id!: i32", 
backer_id as "backer_id!: i32", 
asami_amount as "asami_amount!: Decimal", 
disbursement_id as "disbursement_id!: i32", 
paid as "paid!: bool", 
created_at as "created_at!: UtcDateTime"
